hosting_tab_BOOST_request_success: Your plan has been successfully boosted.
hosting_tab_BOOST_request_error: An error has occurred when boosting your plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_update_title: You want to change your boost plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_update_error: An error has occurred when changing your boost plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_title: You're about to disable your boost plan.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_description: You want to downgrade to your original plan (current plan). You will be able to change your plan again afterwards. You will be billed just once next month for the boost plan used this month. The amount to pay will be based on the highest-level plan you use this month.
hosting_tab_BOOST_accept_cgv: I have understood and I accept the conditions of service. My hosting plan will be updated a few minutes after validation.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_success: Your boost plan has been deactivated.
hosting_tab_BOOST_disable_error: An error has occurred when deactivating your boost plan.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_guide_help: Need help with your emails sent from scripts?
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_info: This page only shows emails sent from CGI/PERL/PHP scripts.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_purge_info: Firstly, you need to block the sending of emails before you can purge them.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_error: An error has occurred when retrieving information:
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_block_quest: You are about to block emails from being sent from your web hosting plan. Emails will be queued for 72 hours, but none will be deleted. During this period, you may unblock the email sending, or purge the emails.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_purge_quest: You're about to delete all the queued emails in your account. Afterwards, your account will be automatically unblocked. The operation will take between 5 and 10 minutes.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_unblock_que: You are about to unblock the distribution of emails sent from your web hosting account. You will be able to send your next email. Mails that were blocked will be sent.
hosting_tab_AUTOMATED_EMAILS_err_reports: Enter the email address where you wish to receive error reports. If an error occurs when you send an email from your web hosting plan, you will receive an email the following day.
The email address that error reports will be sent to has been changed.
An error has occurred when changing the email address that error reports will be sent to:
You must enter an email address.

hosting_change_main_domain_help_title: Attach your hosting plan to one of your other domains
hosting_change_main_domain_help_desc: You cannot change your primary domain to an external domain. You will need to transfer your domain to OVH beforehand in order to attach it to your hosting plan.
hosting_change_main_domain_help_keep_ema: With a hosting plan, you can have email addresses associated with your domain. If you transfer your domain, you will need to subscribe to the MX Plan to keep these addresses.
hosting_change_main_domain_help_mxplan_d: For more information about the MX Plan solution, click
